title: Video-Based Simulation Learning for Enhancing Elementary Engineering Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: An experiential engineering education program for pre-service teachers and education enthusiasts, offering immersive learning environments through VR/simulation.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three actual workflows in an engineer's professional practice
Learners can apply the engineering problem-solving process through video-based simulation activities
Learners improve interest in engineering fields by over 20% through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
